card.name: Baron Nashor
card.text: When Baron Nashor dies, your opponents may put a +1/+1 counter on up to five target creatures.

card.name: Large Krug
card.text: When Large Krug dies, spawn two colorless 1/1 Golem Monsters. Other Golem creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Rift Herald
card.text: When Right Herald enters the battlefield you may have it destroy target Turret an opponent controls.

card.name: Cloud Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Cloud Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, you may untap any number of creatures you control.

card.name: Razorbeak
card.text: Flying When Razorbeak enters the battlefield, spawn three 0/1 white Bird Monster creatures.

card.name: Blue Sentinel
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Scry 1. If Blue Sentinel dies, each opponent may draw a card.

card.name: Ocean Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Ocean Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, you may Scry 1, then draw 1.

card.name: Archaic Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Archaic Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, you may search your library for an equipment or aura card and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Murk Wolves
card.text: When Murk Wolves deals combat damage to an opponent, put a 1/1 black Wolf Monster creature token into play under your control.

card.name: Vilemaw
card.text: Reach Whenever Vilemaw deals combat damage to creature, stun that creature. If that creature is a minion, destroy it instead.

card.name: Brambleback
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may give target creature you control +1/+1 until end of turn. If Brambleback dies, target opponent may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature they control.

card.name: Infernal Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Infernal Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Gromp
card.text: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to Gromp, it deals 1 damage to that creature.

card.name: Mountain Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Mountain Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.

card.name: Elder Dragon
card.text: Flying, Affinity for Dragons Other Dragons you control have double strike.

card.name: Fountain Obelisk
card.text: Defender, Indestructible, Hexproof Fountain Obelisk gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature. As long as Fountain Obelisk is blocking, other blocking creatures you control get +0/+1. T: Deal 5 true damage to target attacking creature.

card.name: Inhibitor Turret
card.text: Defender Inhibitor Turret gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature. As long as Inhibitor Turret is blocking, other blocking creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Inner Turret
card.text: Defender Inner Turret gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature.

card.name: Nexus Turret
card.text: Defender Nexus Turret gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature. As long as Nexus Turret is blocking, other blocking creatures you control get +0/+1. When Nexus Turret enters the battlefield, create a copy of it.

card.name: Outer Turret
card.text: Defender
